Description: Cross pendant; bronze; with expanding arms terminating in a circular cross-section; suspension loop in tact.
Curator's comments: Parallel: W. M. Flinders Petrie, Amulets (London 1914) cat. 137.n.
Bibliographic references: Brunton 1930 / Qau and Badari III (pl. xxxix)
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
